entities.name: kraucher
entities.description: House-elf who is being questioned by Harry about his escape from the Inferi.

entities.name: regulus
entities.description: Master of Kreacher who told him to come back.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts who is trying to understand how Kreacher escaped the Inferi.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Dark wizard who made a mistake by not considering house-elf magic.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts who is trying to understand how Kreacher escaped the Inferi.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Student at Hogwarts who explains why Voldemort made a mistake by not considering house-elf magic.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Headmaster of Hogwarts who is mentioned as someone who could Apparate in and out of the cave.

relationships.description: Voldemort underestimated house-elf magic, thinking it was beneath his notice.
Regulus is the master of Kreacher.
